Name: cheese production, soft, from cow milk | whey | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/10:Manufacture of food products/105:Manufacture of dairy products/1050:Manufacture of dairy products
Description: This dataset has been created mainly based on a study (Kim, D., et.al., 2013, Life cycle assessment of cheese and whey production in the USA) which collected data from 6 different creameries producing mozzarella. Each facility has a different size and technology. Thus this study is an average of different technologies of mozzarella production.
